page.title: 13EAR, NOSE AND THROAT HOSP.
page.content: This is a childrens hospital. Children aged 6 months to 16 years go to the hospital if they need their tonsils taken out. When they have infected tonsils and adenoids often they cannot breathe or hear very well. Sometimes they go quite deaf. There are 28 beds in the hospital but when we visited there were only 4 children in them waiting for operations. Usually the children only stay in for about two weeks. In each ward there are television sets and books for the children. There are two wards and one playroom where we saw a boy painting. There is also a room for the mums to stay in, vandals have broken some windows in this room. The Matron told us the hospital might have to close down because of the damage the vandals do, they do not have money to keep repairing things. cont.
